about_the_game:
"We’re not reinventing the wheel here; survival and crafting are auxiliary elements of the game. It is highly recommended for those who don’t like the genre or are tired of survival games."

“Play solo or enjoy co-op with friends.”

"Our main character is a lieutenant, a soldier who was discharged from the army and is living as a homeless person. He finds himself in the midst of a disastrous war and flees the city to the forested area. He lives this way for a while, trying to survive and go as far as he can. One day, after walking too much and fainting from exhaustion, he is found by the residents of a nearby town, and events unfold from there."

Exploration and Building: Players explore the game world and place objects to build and fortify their base.

Defense and Combat: Occasionally, raiders will attack the player’s base. Players must defend their base by engaging in gunfights and combat scenarios.

Mission Objectives: Players will also undertake specific missions where they need to navigate to designated areas, engage in combat, and complete objectives.

Resource Management: After each mission or raid, players gather resources and upgrade their base and equipment.

Progression: As players complete missions and defend against raids, they earn experience points and unlock new abilities and equipment.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains intense violence and blood. Players will engage in gunfights and combat scenarios where characters can be killed. There is no sexual content in this game.

name: Ashes of Ambition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10, windows11
  • Processor: intel 5 9.gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1660super
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10, windows11
  • Processor: i5 12.gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Enjoy 4 different types of vehicles, earn money, craft, gather, trade, produce electricity - sell or use it, establish a radio station to contact other survivors and trade with them. Experience the thrill of rising from nothing to the top and dive into the story that awaits you.
